image.title: Redmi Turbo 4 MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.100.0.VOJTWXM Recovery update for POCO X7 Pro Taiwan
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: POCO X7 Pro Taiwan

Codename: rodin

Version: OS2.0.100.0.VOJTWXM | 15.0

Size: 5.8 GB

MD5: de13095578b01be103c605e4531f9be4

Changelog:
[Home screen]
New: After turning off the Home screen search bar, a 4×6 layout option becomes available
[Xiaomi HyperConnect]
Optimization: Device connection pop-ups
[Recents]
Fix: Recents couldn't be cleared in some cases
[Game speed booster]
New: Game Turbo performance dashboard
Optimization: Game Turbo interface improvements

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
